metadata.title: CVE-2024-0092 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability where animproper check or improper handling of exception conditions might lead todenial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-470 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-470-server package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-535 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-535-server package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
